trans-unit.source: Contains methods and fields for UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: UI オートメーション クライアント アプリケーションのメソッドとフィールドが含まれています。

trans-unit.source: Registers a method that handles [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] events.
trans-unit.target: 処理するメソッドを登録[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]イベント。

trans-unit.source: Some classes, such as <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridPattern>, expose fields identifying events that are specific to the class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridPattern>クラスに固有のイベントを識別するフィールドを公開する</xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridPattern>など、一部のクラス

trans-unit.source: The AddAutomationEventHandler method provides a mechanism that enables you to register handlers for these events.
trans-unit.target: AddAutomationEventHandler メソッドは、これらのイベント ハンドラーを登録することができますメカニズムを提供します。

trans-unit.source: `eventHandler` can be an instance of the method, or a reference to the method (`AddressOf` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: `eventHandler`インスタンス メソッド、またはメソッドへの参照を指定できます (`AddressOf` Visual Basic で)。

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the event the method will handle.
trans-unit.target: メソッドを処理するイベントの識別子。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element to associate with the event handler.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]イベント ハンドラーに関連付ける要素。

trans-unit.source: The scope of events to be handled; that is, whether they are on the element itself, or on its ancestors and descendants.
trans-unit.target: イベントが処理される; のスコープつまり、あるかに自体には、要素またはその先祖および子孫にします。

trans-unit.source: The method to call when the specified event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 指定したイベントが発生したときに呼び出すメソッド。

trans-unit.source: Registers a method that will handle focus-changed events.
trans-unit.target: フォーカス変更イベントを処理するメソッドを登録します。

trans-unit.source: Focus-changed events are system-wide; you cannot set a narrower scope.
trans-unit.target: フォーカス変更イベントがシステム全体です。狭いスコープを設定することはできません。

trans-unit.source: `eventHandler` can be an instance of the method, or a reference to the method (`AddressOf` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: `eventHandler`インスタンス メソッド、またはメソッドへの参照を指定できます (`AddressOf` Visual Basic で)。

trans-unit.source: The method to call when the event occurs.
trans-unit.target: イベントが発生したときに呼び出すメソッド。

trans-unit.source: Registers a method that will handle property-changed events.
trans-unit.target: プロパティ変更イベントを処理するメソッドを登録します。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] item specified by the supplied [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element might not support the properties specified by the `properties` parameter.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]で指定された指定した項目[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]要素で指定されたプロパティはサポートされませんが、`properties`パラメーター。

trans-unit.source: `eventHandler` can be an instance of the method, or a reference to the method (`AddressOf` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: `eventHandler`インスタンス メソッド、またはメソッドへの参照を指定できます (`AddressOf` Visual Basic で)。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element with which to associate the event handler.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]をイベント ハンドラーを関連付ける要素。

trans-unit.source: The scope of events to be handled; that is, whether they are on the element itself, or on its ancestors and children.
trans-unit.target: イベントが処理される; のスコープつまり、あるかに自体には、要素またはその先祖と子にします。

trans-unit.source: The method to call when the event occurs.
trans-unit.target: イベントが発生したときに呼び出すメソッド。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] properties of interest.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]の該当するプロパティです。

trans-unit.source: Registers the method that will handle structure-changed events.
trans-unit.target: 構造体変更イベントを処理するメソッドを登録します。

trans-unit.source: `eventHandler` can be an instance of the method, or a reference to the method (`AddressOf` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: `eventHandler`インスタンス メソッド、またはメソッドへの参照を指定できます (`AddressOf` Visual Basic で)。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element with which to associate the event handler.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]をイベント ハンドラーを関連付ける要素。

trans-unit.source: The scope of events to be handled; that is, whether they are on the element itself, or on its ancestors and descendants.
trans-unit.target: イベントが処理される; のスコープつまり、あるかに自体には、要素またはその先祖および子孫にします。

trans-unit.source: The method to call when the structure-changed event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 構造の変更イベントが発生したときに呼び出すメソッド。

trans-unit.source: Compares two integer arrays containing run-time [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id#plural](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] to determine whether their content is the same.
trans-unit.target: 実行時を含む&2; つの整数の配列を比較して[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id#plural](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)]コンテンツが同じかどうかを判断します。

trans-unit.source: If either of the arguments is a null reference (`Nothing` in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)]), Compare throws an <xref:System.ArgumentNullException> exception.
trans-unit.target: いずれかの引数が null 参照 (`Nothing`で[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)])、比較がスローされます、<xref:System.ArgumentNullException>例外です</xref:System.ArgumentNullException>。

trans-unit.source: The first run-time [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-id-md.md)] to compare.
trans-unit.target: 最初の実行時[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-id-md.md)]を比較します。

trans-unit.source: The second run-time [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-id-md.md)] to compare.
trans-unit.target: 2 つ目の実行時[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-id-md.md)]を比較します。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the compared run-time [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] refer to the same [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] element; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>場合、比較の実行時[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)]同じを参照してください[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]要素以外の場合<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>です。

trans-unit.source: Compares two [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elements, returning <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if both refer to the same [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] element.
trans-unit.target: 比較する&2; つ[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]要素、返す<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>場合は両方とも同じ[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]要素。

trans-unit.source: If either of the arguments is a null reference (`Nothing` in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)]), <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Automation.Compare%2A> throws an <xref:System.ArgumentNullException> exception.
trans-unit.target: いずれかの引数が null 参照 (`Nothing`で[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)])、<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Automation.Compare%2A>スロー、<xref:System.ArgumentNullException>例外です</xref:System.ArgumentNullException></xref:System.Windows.Automation.Automation.Compare%2A>。

trans-unit.source: This method is equivalent to the equality operator for <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> objects.
trans-unit.target: このメソッドは、等値演算子の<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>オブジェクト</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>。

trans-unit.source: The first [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element to compare.
trans-unit.target: 最初の[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]要素を比較します。

trans-unit.source: The second [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element to compare.
trans-unit.target: 2 番目[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]要素を比較します。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the run time identifiers of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] elements are the same; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>場合のランタイム識別子、[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]要素は同じです。 それ以外の場合<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>です。

trans-unit.source: Represents a predefined view of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree that includes only [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elements that can contain content.
trans-unit.target: 定義済みのビューを表す、[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]のみを含むツリー[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]要素コンテンツを含むことができます。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 追加します。

trans-unit.source: Represents a predefined view of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree that includes only [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elements that are controls.
trans-unit.target: 定義済みのビューを表す、[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]のみを含むツリー[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]コントロールである要素。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 追加します。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the name of the specified control pattern.
trans-unit.target: 指定されたコントロール パターンの名前を取得します。

trans-unit.source: The identifier of the control pattern.
trans-unit.target: コントロール パターンの識別子。

trans-unit.source: The friendly name of the control pattern, or a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)]) if the specified pattern is not found.
trans-unit.target: コントロール パターン、または null 参照のフレンドリ名 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref>で[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)]) 指定したパターンが見つからない場合。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the name of the specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property.
trans-unit.target: 指定した名前を取得[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]プロパティです。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property identifier of the named property.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]名前付きのプロパティのプロパティの識別子。

trans-unit.source: The friendly name of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property, or a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)]) if the specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property is not found.
trans-unit.target: 表示名、[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]プロパティ、または null 参照 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref>で[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)]) 場合は、指定した[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]プロパティが見つかりません。

trans-unit.source: Represents a predefined view of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree that includes all [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elements.
trans-unit.target: 定義済みのビューを表す、[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]すべてを含むツリー[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]要素。

trans-unit.source: Used by itself, this condition is functionally identical to <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Condition>.
trans-unit.target: 単独で使用される、この条件は、機能的に<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Condition>。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Condition>と同じ

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 追加します。

trans-unit.source: Removes all registered [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] event handlers.
trans-unit.target: 登録されているすべての削除[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]イベント ハンドラー。

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] event handler.
trans-unit.target: 指定された削除[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]イベント ハンドラー。

trans-unit.source: An event identifier.
trans-unit.target: イベント識別子。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element on which to remove the event handler.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]イベント ハンドラーを削除する要素。

trans-unit.source: The handler method that was passed to <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Automation.AddAutomationEventHandler*> for the specified event identifier and [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element.
trans-unit.target: ハンドラー メソッドに渡された<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Automation.AddAutomationEventHandler*>指定されたイベント識別子と[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]要素</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Automation.AddAutomationEventHandler*>。

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified focus-changed event handler.
trans-unit.target: 指定したフォーカス変更イベント ハンドラーを削除します。

trans-unit.source: The following example code shows a focus-changed event handler being added and removed.
trans-unit.target: 次のコード例は、追加、削除されるフォーカス変更イベント ハンドラーを示します。

trans-unit.source: [!code-vb[UIAClient_snip#102](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/UIAClient_snip/ClientForm.vb#102)] [!code-cs[UIAClient_snip#102](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/CustomElementClient/ClientForm.cs#102)]
trans-unit.target: [!code-vb[UIAClient_snipf](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/UIAClient_snip/ClientForm.vb#102)][!code-cs[UIAClient_snipf ](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/CustomElementClient/ClientForm.cs#102)]

trans-unit.source: A handler method that was passed to <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Automation.AddAutomationFocusChangedEventHandler*>
trans-unit.target: ハンドラー メソッドに渡されました。<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Automation.AddAutomationFocusChangedEventHandler*></xref:System.Windows.Automation.Automation.AddAutomationFocusChangedEventHandler*>

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified property-changed event handler.
trans-unit.target: 指定したプロパティ変更イベント ハンドラーを削除します。

trans-unit.source: The following example code shows a property-changed event handler being added and removed.
trans-unit.target: 次のコード例は、追加、削除されるプロパティ変更イベント ハンドラーを示します。

trans-unit.source: [!code-cs[UIAClient_snip#172](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/CustomElementClient/PropertySnips.cs#172)] [!code-vb[UIAClient_snip#172](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/UIAClient_snip/PropertySnips.vb#172)]
trans-unit.target: [!code-cs[UIAClient_snip¬](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/CustomElementClient/PropertySnips.cs#172)][!code-vb[UIAClient_snip¬ ](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/UIAClient_snip/PropertySnips.vb#172)]

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element from which to remove the event handler.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]をイベント ハンドラーを削除する要素。

trans-unit.source: A handler method that was passed to <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Automation.AddAutomationPropertyChangedEventHandler*> for the specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element.
trans-unit.target: ハンドラー メソッドに渡された<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Automation.AddAutomationPropertyChangedEventHandler*>、指定された[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]要素</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Automation.AddAutomationPropertyChangedEventHandler*>。

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified structure-changed event handler.
trans-unit.target: 指定した構造変更イベント ハンドラーを削除します。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element from which to remove the event handler.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]をイベント ハンドラーを削除する要素。

trans-unit.source: A handler method that was passed to <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Automation.AddStructureChangedEventHandler*> for the specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element.
trans-unit.target: ハンドラー メソッドに渡された<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Automation.AddStructureChangedEventHandler*>、指定された[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]要素</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Automation.AddStructureChangedEventHandler*>。
